title: BRIEF-India's Federal Bank Sept-Qtr Net Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's Federal Bank Sept-Qtr Net Profit Rises

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 13:25)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Federal Bank Sept-Qtr Net Profit Rises Oct 16 (Reuters) - Federal Bank Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT 4.17 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 2.66 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT WAS 4.07 BILLION RUPEES * SEPT QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 32.54 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 27.65 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER PROVISIONS AND CONTINGENCIES 2.52 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 2.89 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER GROSS NPA 3.07% VERSUS 2.99% PREVIOUS QUARTER * SEPT QUARTER NET NPA 1.59% VERSUS 1.49% PREVIOUS QUARTER

BRIEF-India's Federal Bank Sept-Qtr Net Profit Rises
description: BRIEF-India's Federal Bank Sept-Qtr Net Profit Rises
